skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Manage educational skills in your institution
skills.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, description or domain...
skills.skillExplanation: A skill represents a specific competency or capability that students should develop within a domain. Skills are more specific than domains and define exactly what will be evaluated. For example, within the "Mathematics" domain, you might have skills like "Basic Algebra", "Geometry", "Calculus", or "Statistics". Each skill can have multiple proficiency levels that define student progress.
skills.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the skill "{name}"?
skills.deleteWarning: This skill has {count} associated assessments. You cannot delete a skill that is used in assessments.
skills.cannotEditSkillUsedInAssessments: Cannot edit skill used in assessments
skills.aiHelperDescription: Use AI to generate suggestions for skill names and descriptions
skills.noSourcesFoundDescription: Try adjusting your filters or add a custom source
skills.sourcesManagementDescription: Select a skill to manage its associated sources and references

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Manage sources and references for skills
sources.sourcesExplanation: Sources are references, textbooks, articles, and other materials that provide the foundation for skill development and assessment. They help establish the theoretical and practical basis for evaluating student competencies.
sources.sourcesUsageExplanation: By managing sources for each skill, you ensure that assessments are based on solid academic foundations and that students have access to appropriate reference materials for their learning journey.
sources.noUnlinkedSourcesDescription: All your sources are already linked to this skill or you haven't uploaded any sources yet

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: Manage academic domains for your institution
domains.createAndGoToSkills: Create and go to skills page
domains.createAndShowSuggestions: Create and show me skills suggestions
domains.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the domain "{name}"?
domains.deleteWarning: This domain has {count} associated skills. You cannot delete a domain that has skills.
domains.domainExplanation: A domain is a broad area of knowledge or academic discipline that groups related skills together. Domains help organize the curriculum and provide a framework for skill development across different subjects and topics.

teacher.welcomeMessage: Welcome back, {name}. Manage your educational content and track student progress.
teacher.assessmentManagementDescription: Create and manage assessments, track student attempts
teacher.studentManagementDescription: Manage students, groups and academic content

assessmentForm.sourceAwareGenerationDescription: The AI will analyze the actual content of your selected sources to create more accurate and relevant cases.
assessmentForm.caseNavigationDescription: Enable navigation between different sections of the case
assessmentForm.contextAndScenarioRequired: Context and main scenario are required to generate questions
assessmentForm.availableFromMustBeBeforeAvailableUntil: Available from date must be before available until date
assessmentForm.disputePeriodMustBeAtLeast3Days: Dispute period must be at least 3 days
assessmentForm.selectSkillsDescription: Select up to 4 skills that will be assessed in this evaluation. Skills are organized by domain.
assessmentForm.maxSkillsReached: You have reached the maximum of 4 skills allowed
assessmentForm.pleaseSelectSkills: Please select at least one skill
assessmentForm.assignGroupsDescription: Select the student groups that will have access to this assessment.
assessmentForm.integrityProtectionDescription: Enables protection against copy and paste during student assessment
assessmentForm.assessmentExplanation: Creating an assessment involves several important steps. Each field serves a specific purpose in creating an effective evaluation. Below you'll find detailed explanations for each field to help you create the best possible assessment for your students.
assessmentForm.assessmentNameImportant: Assessment Name & Description: Write these in student-friendly language as they will be visible to students on their dashboard.
assessmentForm.evaluationContextImportant: Evaluation Context: This field is very important! It provides context to the AI for generating a more familiar and relevant case scenario. Include details about student characteristics, environment, and cultural features.
assessmentForm.assessmentNameField: A clear, descriptive title that students will see. Keep it concise but informative (max 45 characters).
assessmentForm.descriptionField: A brief explanation of what the assessment covers and what students can expect. This helps students understand the assessment scope (max 1024 characters).
assessmentForm.difficultyLevelField: Choose the appropriate challenge level (Easy, Medium, Hard) that matches your students' current abilities.
assessmentForm.educationalLevelField: Select the academic level that best represents your students (Primary, Secondary, Technical, University, Professional).
assessmentForm.outputLanguageField: Choose the language for the AI-generated case text and questions (Spanish or English).
assessmentForm.evaluationContextField: Provide detailed information about your students' characteristics, learning environment, cultural background, and any relevant context. This helps the AI generate more relevant and familiar case scenarios.
assessmentForm.questionsPerSkillField: Number of questions that will be generated for each selected skill (1-20). More questions provide more comprehensive evaluation.
assessmentForm.availableFromField: When students can start taking this assessment. Set this to control access timing.
assessmentForm.availableUntilField: When students can no longer access this assessment. Set a reasonable deadline.
assessmentForm.disputePeriodField: Number of days after completion when students can dispute their results (3-30 days).
assessmentForm.integrityProtectionField: When enabled, prevents students from copying and pasting during the assessment to maintain academic integrity.
assessmentForm.showTeacherNameField: When enabled, students will see your name on the assessment. Useful for personal connection.
assessmentForm.skillSelectionField: Choose up to 4 skills that will be evaluated. Skills are organized by domain and represent specific competencies.
assessmentForm.groupAssignmentField: Select which student groups will have access to this assessment. Students must be in assigned groups to see the assessment.
assessmentForm.caseGenerationField: The AI will create a realistic case scenario based on your selected skills and evaluation context. You can edit the generated text or write your own.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: Manage student groups in your institution
groups.groupExplanation: A group is a collection of students who can access the same assessments. Groups allow you to organize students logically, such as by class, academic level, or specific program. Each group can have multiple students and each student can belong to multiple groups.
groups.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{name}"?
groups.deleteWarning: This group has {count} members. Members will be removed from the group.

users.title: Students
users.studentExplanation: Students are users who can take assessments assigned by teachers. Each student belongs to an institution and can be a member of multiple groups. Students can view their available assessments, take assessments, and review their results.

assessments.title: Assessments
assessments.assessmentExplanation: An assessment is a measurement tool that allows you to evaluate student knowledge and skills. Each assessment is associated with a specific domain and skill, and can be assigned to student groups. Assessments can be in draft, active, or inactive status.
assessments.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

attempts.title: Attempts
attempts.noResultsFound: No results found for this attempt.
attempts.noAttemptsFound: No attempts found for this assessment.
attempts.attemptExplanation: An attempt is an assessment session completed by a student. Each attempt includes the student's responses, AI evaluation, and final results. Teachers can review attempts, view detailed results, and handle student disputes about their grades.
attempts.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the attempt by "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

student.trackYourProgress: Track your progress and take assessments
student.welcomeMessage: Welcome back, {name}. Here are your available assessments and recent activity.
student.disputeAvailable: Within dispute period - you can still dispute this result

forms.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
forms.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

forms.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

demo.title: Inteliexamen
demo.subtitle: AI-Powered Educational Assessment Platform
demo.welcomeDescription: Experience the future of educational assessment with our AI-powered platform.
demo.assessmentsDescription: Create and manage intelligent assessments that adapt to student needs.
demo.analyticsDescription: Get detailed insights into student performance and learning progress.

landing.title: Inteliexamen
landing.subtitle: Where Learning Meets Conversation
landing.description: Discover a revolutionary approach to education where students engage in meaningful conversations with AI to demonstrate their knowledge, while teachers effortlessly create comprehensive skill-based assessments.

hero.tagline: Assessment That Actually Helps Students Learn
hero.subtitle: No more multiple choice. Real conversations, real understanding.
hero.description: Students solve complex, real-world cases through interactive dialogue with AI. Teachers save hours creating meaningful assessments that measure what truly matters. Everyone wins.

whatIs.title: What is Inteliexamen?
whatIs.subtitle: The complete assessment ecosystem that transforms how organizations teach, evaluate, and inspire learning success.

forWho.title: Built for Every Learning Organization
forWho.description: Whether you're running a government training program, managing a school district, leading a corporate university, or operating any educational institution, Inteliexamen provides the complete infrastructure you need to deliver meaningful assessments that actually help people learn and grow.

ecosystem.title: Your Complete Assessment Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Forget scattered tools and complicated workflows. Inteliexamen brings everything together in one intelligent platform that handles your entire assessment lifecycle—from defining what students need to learn, to measuring how well they've learned it, all powered by AI that makes teachers' lives easier.

studentExperience.title: Where Students Actually Want to Learn
studentExperience.description: This isn't your typical test-and-grade system. Our student area creates an environment where learners feel supported, motivated, and excited to demonstrate what they know. Instead of feeling judged, students engage in meaningful conversations that help them discover and improve their understanding.

benefits.friendly: Supportive learning environment that encourages growth
benefits.motivating: Engaging conversations that inspire deeper thinking

features.title: Why Teachers and Students Love Inteliexamen
features.subtitle: Finally, an assessment platform that encourages learning instead of just testing
features.aiDesc: Students discuss real-world cases with AI, improving their answers through dialogue instead of guessing from A, B, C, D
features.analyticsDesc: Teachers create comprehensive evaluations in minutes, not hours, with AI assistance and smart skill mapping
features.securityDesc: Built-in integrity protection prevents cheating while maintaining a supportive learning environment
features.speedDesc: Define exactly what students need to know and measure their progress with clear achievement levels
features.psychologyDesc: Disputes allowed, multiple attempts encouraged - we focus on learning, not punishment

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your educational assessments? We'd love to hear from you.

form.privacy: We respect your privacy and will never share your information.

landing.chooseRole: Choose your role and start using the platform

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Inteliexamen, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our educational assessment platform. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we obtain automatically when you use our services:

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.content: When you register for an account, we collect information such as your name, email address, institutional affiliation, role (student, teacher, administrator), and any other information you choose to provide. For educational purposes, we may also collect assessment responses, performance data, and learning analytics.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.content: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our platform, including log data, device information, IP addresses, browser type, pages visited, time spent on pages, and other usage statistics to improve our services and user experience.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our educational assessment services; create and manage user accounts; facilitate assessments and provide AI-powered feedback; generate analytics and insights for educational purposes; communicate with you about our services; ensure platform security and prevent fraud; comply with legal obligations; and conduct research to enhance educational methodologies.

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances: with your educational institution (for students and teachers); with service providers who assist in operating our platform under strict confidentiality agreements; when required by law or to protect our rights and safety; in connection with a business transfer or merger; and with your explicit consent for specific purposes.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption of data in transit and at rest, secure authentication systems, regular security audits, and restricted access to personal information on a need-to-know basis.

userRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
userRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information; opt out of certain communications; request data portability; object to processing in certain circumstances; and lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our platform. These help us remember your preferences, provide personalized content, analyze usage patterns, and improve our services. You can control cookie settings through your browser, though some features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after such changes indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

skillLevels.title: Skill Levels
skillLevels.description: Define proficiency levels for this skill
skillLevels.skillLevelExplanation: A skill level defines the degree of mastery a student should demonstrate for a specific skill. Levels range from beginner to advanced, providing a clear progression of learning. The level template has been created by the administrator and is institution-wide, ensuring consistency in skill assessment.
skillLevels.skillLevelsDescription: Define the proficiency levels for this skill. Each level should have a clear description of what students should be able to demonstrate.
skillLevels.describeStudentsAtLevel: Describe what students should demonstrate at {level} level...
skillLevels.generateSkillLevelDescriptions: Generate Skill Level Descriptions with AI
skillLevels.aiDescription: AI will generate comprehensive descriptions for all skill levels based on the skill information. You can review and apply the suggestions to your skill levels.

StudentAssessmentAttempt.performanceEvaluationNote: Your performance will be evaluated against these levels
StudentAssessmentAttempt.academicSourcesDescription: These academic sources provide the theoretical foundation for the skills being evaluated. Use them to enhance your understanding and improve your responses. The AI will reference these sources to provide you with helpful hints and guidance throughout the assessment.
StudentAssessmentAttempt.howToUseSourcesEffectively: How to use these sources effectively
StudentAssessmentAttempt.reviewSourcesBeforeStarting: Review the sources before starting your assessment to understand key concepts
StudentAssessmentAttempt.aiMayReferenceSources: When the AI provides hints, it may reference these sources to guide your thinking
StudentAssessmentAttempt.useTheoreticalFrameworks: Use the theoretical frameworks from these sources to structure your responses
StudentAssessmentAttempt.noSpecificSourcesAvailable: No specific sources available for this skill
StudentAssessmentAttempt.clarificationTooltip: Clarification questions and responses don't count toward your turn limit. You can ask for clarification as many times as needed.
StudentAssessmentAttempt.startByResponding: Start by responding to the case scenario above. The AI will evaluate your response and provide feedback.
StudentAssessmentAttempt.maxTurnsReached: You have reached the maximum number of conversation turns. The AI will now evaluate your responses.
StudentAssessmentAttempt.maxTurnsReachedWaiting: Maximum turns reached. Waiting for AI evaluation...
StudentAssessmentAttempt.enterToSendIntegrityDisabled: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line. Copy/paste is disabled for assessment integrity.
StudentAssessmentAttempt.enterToSend: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line.
